channel.title: Short and to the point. $$
channel.description:
hey if there are any developers who I can take serious out there im looking for someone who is willing to help me for about an hr ill pay he/she based on what gets done or I can do by hr.
people with outrageous prices will be ignored and those who are serious about making some money please feel free to contact me.
things im asking help for:
Get my server online. few small questions here and there

item.title: Short and to the point. $$
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

zizema660:

im not the host of the server, im giving it to someone and they are hosting it but I want them to work with it first.

Okay… So exactly what are you having an issue with then?
The point of this section is to get help with an issue.

If you’re looking for a programmer to work for you, then you should look at the Development Teams section.

Read full topic

item.title: Short and to the point. $$
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

If you are incapable of even getting a server online, what does that show to your projected player base? You should demonstrate your ability to be a good host and be capable of solving server issues on your own. Not to mention, offering goods for services on this site is still against the rules. As has been posted in the last couple thousand posts that look like this one.

Read full topic
